attributes.action: sort out the showing of the home nations world cup qualifying matches on tv
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today, I was looking forward to watching the Andorra-England world cup qualifying natch on TV. I don't subscribe to satelite TV as a personal choice that i don't watch a lot of TV. 
But i find that Satanta has exclusive rights not just to this gane, but to the Crotia game, and further matches in Ukraine, Kazhastan and Belarus. There is not even highlights. 
The same probabaly exists with Wales, Scotland and N.Ireland matches.
There is not even highlights. This is a disgrace where people who alteady pay a TV licence cannot watch thier home nation on TV play in world cup qualifying games.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
